tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
context: Ceramic Crowns and Bridges Fixing,Porcelain inlays and onlays,
review: The most that I like about Dr. Neera Kumar is that she is very soft spoken and gentle. She handles her patient very  carefully and delicately. Her explanation about the treatment is indeed convincing. She is always eager to help and make her patient comfortable.

tags: None
review:
These are not merely dental doctors but become part of yourself and first explain the present problem and also future fall backs along with the plus and minus of their explanations . After satisfying you they start the curing operations. 
Their hands are very skillful and with minimum sittings the cure is done . 
Me and my wife both are very satisfied and strongly recommend that dental problem , if any , be attended by Dr Neera  and Dr Sanjay  Kumar 
GOD bless this couple .......Aryas

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Very cooperative, took frequent breaks for minimising the sensation during filling. Made me feel very comfortable!

tags: None
review: Dr. Neera is friendly, soft spoken and an amazing doctor. She took sufficient time to perform the procedure, explained the cause as well as suggested remediative actions for future. I would highly recommend Dr. Neera

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: Dr Meera Kumar seemed very patient and explained me very precisely the condition of my tooth and the treatment needed. Once she started I was comfortable and realised that she had very good hands and my experience during the procedure was completely painless. This was my first visit to her and was highly impressed.

tags: None
review:
Very skillful, clear choices, well explained.
HIGHLY RECOMMENDED!

tags: None
review: Visited there for tooth extraction and bridging for my mom. Consultant went well but I think recommendation would have more crisp. Prices are also high as compared to the market.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
********* **** ******* Would like to recommend to others also. Polite communication.
Good advice and experienced.
Cleanliness

tags: None
review: Staff was very enthusiastic and friendly. I was treated by Dr Neera, and would like to underline the outstanding level of treatment they had provided. I would definitely recommend going to this practice.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: I am fully satisfied with the treatment and the friendly behaviour. They make me feel so comfortable for which is really a imp. Perspect.
